name: Hoosier Tyre Rear Sand
description: The 110/100-19  is optimal as a rear tire for sand tracks and muddy racing conditions. The 110/100-19 has a unique tread pattern that will allow the tire to be used in sandy and muddy conditions but also will still perform in intermediate conditions. This tire helps get the holeshot but will still perform at a high level in multiple conditions. Optimal air pressure range is 13-14 psi.

name: Brembo Racing Brake Pad
description: Brembo 07B36640 Motorcycle Z03 Racing Brake Pad

name: Hoosier Tyre Rear IMX30
description: The 90/100-14 IMX30 is the optimal rear tire for 85cc dirt bikes looking for an advantage over the competition. This tire is designed and developed with the same compound and performance that professional riders are using on the big stages. The intermediate tread pattern is optimal for all conditions and the IMX30 compound is a longer lasting compound with holeshot performance to finish on the podium.

name: Streetbike Brake Pads
description: EBC Brakes™ Organic OE quality replacement motorcycle brake pads are manufactured in the UK using high technology ECO friendly brake pad compounds that deliver fingertip stopping power.
